name: Void Breaker
description:
Void  Breaker,

My second game where i have been fully working on.
Its a multiplayer first person shooter made with unity.
If you will run the game windows will sadly give you a warning publisher unknow.

But i can assure you the game is completly safe if you want to play game press, more information and still run. Probably there wont be anyone online. Try it with a few friends i am looking to add a singleplayer mode but that`s for the future

Feedback is always welcome and it will be nice if you dowload it and take a look.
Special thanks to microman502#6046 for helping with the game
Feedback can be left in comments or contact me on discord: ThePancake#7328

If you play the game please check sometimes if there was a update because it will be big each time

Controls

  • WASD for walking , Shift for sprinting , space bar for jumping
  • Left mouse button for shooting, Right button voor zooming in
  • 1,2,3,4.5 For switching guns 

Enjoy it!

The Dev
